mapper.select: SELECT `no`, memberId, password, passwordFailCnt, memberName, gradeCodeGroup, gradeCode, corpCardLimit, registeredDate, modifiedDate, lastLoginDate FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS `no`, memberId, password, passwordFailCnt, memberName, gradeCodeGroup, gradeCode, corpCardLimit, registeredDate, modifiedDate, lastLoginDate FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 AS `no`) R, ( SELECT memberId, password, passwordFailCnt, memberName, gradeCodeGroup, gradeCode, corpCardLimit, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastLoginDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS lastLoginDate FROM oms_member ORDER BY ${sort} ${order} ) T ) T1 WHERE `no` BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT memberId, password, passwordFailCnt, memberName, gradeCodeGroup, gradeCode, corpCardLimit, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastLoginDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS lastLoginDate FROM oms_member WHERE memberId = #{memberId}

SELECT memberId, memberName, gradeCodeGroup, gradeCode, corpCardLimit, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastLoginDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS lastLoginDate FROM oms_member WHERE memberId != #{memberId} AND memberName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') AND gradeCodeGroup = 0 AND gradeCode = #{gradeCode} ORDER BY memberName ASC

SELECT memberId, memberName, gradeCode, corpCardLimit, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastLoginDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS lastLoginDate FROM oms_member WHERE memberName = #{memberName}
mapper.update: UPDATE oms_member SET passwordFailCnt = 0, lastLoginDate = SYSDATE() WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oms_member ( `memberId`, `password`, `passwordFailCnt`, `memberName`, `gradeCodeGroup`, `gradeCode`, `corpCardLimit`, `registeredDate`, `modifiedDate`, `lastLoginDate` ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{password}, 0, #{memberName}, #{gradeCodeGroup}, #{gradeCode}, #{corpCardLimit}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), NULL )
